name: Top Smither
description:
Top Smither is an atmospheric, immersive incremental game that will take you from your humble beginnings as a nail crafter to being a blacksmithing legend. 

Chapter I (Out Now) - The 1920s, as a struggling blacksmith you slowly pull yourself together by buying new equipment, advertising, and stock to forge yourself a nail empire. Optional Ending (500,000 nails).

Chapter II (December 15th) - The 1930s, your infamous blacksmith reputation has landed you a job minting currency for the government after the economic depression has ruined Britain. However, hyperinflation is a huge possibility - so balancing production and economic integrity will be your greatest challenge. 

Chapter III (December 22th) - The 1940s, the war is raging. The army is in desperate need of ammunition to win the war. A constant stream of ammunition for battles is a necessity. If you don't produce enough ammo in time for big battles, it could lead to the allies losing the war.

Any bugs and issues please tweet them to me! @keanespencer_
